alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 11:17AM CST until January 04 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Cass, Henry and Johnson MO Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Creek at Blairstown. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, The west bank of the creek begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest near 20.3 feet by early evening. It will fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Tue Wed 12pm 6pm 12am Big Creek Blairstown 20.0 20.0 Tue 11am 20.1 20.3 19.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
